snippet: They told South Korean officials that they wanted to defect, while two others expressed wishes to return home, the South’s Unification Ministry said.
abstract: Three North Korean sailors tell South Korean officials they want to defect after their ship strays into South Korean waters due to engine problems.
lead_paragraph: They told South Korean officials that they wanted to defect, while two others expressed wishes to return home, the South’s Unification Ministry said.

headline.main: 3 North Korean Sailors Defect to South After Ship Strays
headline.print_headline: North Korean Sailors Defect to South After Ship Strays
